title: my client wont open, and im stuck using my friends laggy old laptop until the issue gets fixed
body:
my game worked just fine 3 days ago, however when i clicked on the taskbar/desktop shortcut yesterday, it showed the league of legends logo, then it crashed, saying only that the program has stopped working, i have not made any hardware or software changes in the past month except for razer synapse updates for my razer naga 2014, i'm currently using a Toshiba PORTEGE M780-S7240.i even manually reinstalled, then used the hextech repair tool to reinstall, nothing helped. the graphics card drivers are completely up to date, it has a sufficient amount of ram, it doesn't have any fragmentation on the hard drive.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
It sounds like your patcher may not even be able proper connect to our servers. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) covers the most common solutions for this, so that's definitely a good place to continue troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps helped.
yes, thank you, that helped out! it works fine now!
